  • St. Petersburg Peterhof

  • Sailboat on the Nile, Cairo, Egypt

  • Evesham, Abbot Reginald's gateway & old vicarage

  • Lucknow. Modjibaman, India

  • South of India. Seringham. Town-Gate.

  • Córdoba. La Mezquita. Patio de los Naranjos

  • Am Hof, Vienna, Austria, with open air market and equestrian statue in foreground

  • Man with horse standing near the Dead Sea

  • Bordeaux Cathedral, France

  • Orleans - Rue Jeanne D'Arc

  • Berlin--Brandenburgertor

  • Windsor Castle. East Terrace

  • Paris. Grand Opera House. The Stairway

  • Pula Arena, Croatia

  • Agra, Taj Mahal

  • Old Town Bridge Tower, Prague, Czech Republic

  • Lincoln Cathedral, England
